OOC: I overreacted a bit, there, but I know I'm correct. I don't want to se=
em like an ass or anything, but I want it to be made aware that the rules p=
age is MUCH more descriptive and easy to follow now, and one shouldn't have=
 trouble with the rule on god like characters. Oh, and Kevin Ramsey, I'm so=
rry for overeacting as well, but I wasn't moding, I was posting correctly. =
Burning Hammer saying that he's going to ignore Recon is NOT moding...
  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Saturday, March 10, 2001 1:55 AM
  Subject: Re: funny


  O=
OC: I shall not give him any breaks! When I was a newcomer and moded left a=
nd right, as well as I wrote the Sh**iest posts to ever befall mankind, was=
 I given a break? No, I wasn't. All I heard was "thecode, write sensible po=
sts" and "thecode stop moding it's getting annoying," and it was about a ye=
ar later before I started getting respect in the RPG. They were hard on me.=
 I officially got kicked out one time. I will not accept any modes what-so-=
ever. One more thing. Justifiable moding? I don't think so! When I tried to=
 do that early in my career, I was almost shown the door. I've come too far=
 for this moding nonsense. Bah! Oh, and just to show I take board space ser=
iously...BELOW:

  BIC: Divitri had traveled a long time by now, and she ha=
d just stumbled across some dead guy, now. He looked large and fearsome, bu=
t he was in so many pieces. After about an hour of digging through the piec=
es of the pile of scrap, she managed to find the right piece and took the m=
emory. It appeared that this guy was an assimilator, someone who stole the =
sparks of other's. His name was Clash, and he lived for millions of years, =
even though his life during the war was short. Divitri learned about where =
Clash was before, a base with a much larger bot named Serge. (The base is t=
he Chivtron base.) She decides to go there, and sets that as her destinatio=
n. She starts traveling again...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: Prodigey child 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, Marc=
h 10, 2001 1:37 AM
    Subject: funny


    [ok I know I am to post like fi=
ghts and stuff but I just one to say one thing. I admit I mode. but this ne=
w dude Benny. is moding worse then I do. at least  I have some purpose. and=
 what the hell is this crap about him  being an angel and being touched by =
god. He can not be hurt. I got to agree with Kev it is pretty funny. but wo=
uld you all take it easy on him he is new.
